    • printlnString

      public static void printlnString(String string)

    • askWhat

      public static void askWhat(String whatString)

    • graphicsOrderTiles

      public static void graphicsOrderTiles(ArrayList<Couple> tiles)
      Method graphicsOrderTiles is an auxiliary method that allows to graphically represent the tiles chosen by the player. and help him rearrange them in the order he prefers.
      Parameters:
      tiles - - list of tiles chosen by the player.

    • graphicsShelf

      public static String graphicsShelf(ShelfView myShelfView, String name, boolean activEnd, boolean activMerge)
      Method graphicsShelf is an auxiliary method that helps to graphically represent the shelf of the player on the TUI.
      Parameters:
      myShelfView - - shelf of the player.
      name - - name of the player.
      activEnd - - true you want to have at the end of each line the character "\n".
      activMerge - - true if you want to merge the String with another one.
      Returns:
      - string of the player's Shelf graphic, so that if you want you can merge it with other strings.

    • getStringCGC

      public static String getStringCGC(int numCGC)
      Method getStringCGC given the number of the CGC it returns the graphic of the CGC.
      Parameters:
      numCGC - - number of the CGC.
      Returns:
      - graphic of the CGC.

    • setStringCGC

      public static void setStringCGC(int numCGC)
      Method setStringCGC sets the graphic of the CGC given the number of the CGC.
      Parameters:
      numCGC - - number of the CGC.

    • graphicsCGC

      public static String graphicsCGC(int idCG, int numCG)
      Method graphicsCGC graphically builds the CGC given the id of the CGC. The numCG is used to know if it is the first or the second CGC.
      Parameters:
      idCG - - CGC id.
      numCG - - CGC number (1 or 2).
      Returns:
      - CGC graphic.

    • mergerString

      public static String mergerString(String stringLeft, String stringRight, boolean activEndN, boolean activMerge, boolean topAlign)
      mergerString method returns merging two strings so that it returns a single block of strings, with the string content of the first string on the left while that of the second string on the right of the new string.
      Parameters:
      stringLeft - - String of which you want its lines to be to the left on the final String.
      stringRight - - String of which you want its lines to be to the right on the final String.
      activEndN - - true you want to have at the end of each line the character "\n".
      activMerge - - activates the merge parameter on the final string, so that you can merge the resulting String with another.
      topAlign - - aligns the merging of two Strings up or down.
      Returns:
      - the joining of lines between two Strings.

    • graphicsLivingRoom

      public static String graphicsLivingRoom(LivingRoomView livingRoomView, boolean activeEnd, boolean activeMerge)
      Method graphicsLivingRoom graphically builds the living room on the TUI.
      Parameters:
      livingRoomView - - the living room.
      activeEnd - - true you want to have at the end of each line the character "\n".
      activeMerge - - true if you want to merge the String with another one.
      Returns:
      - the LivingRoom graphic so that you may or may not merge the lines with those of another String.

    • setStringPCG

      public static void setStringPCG(ArrayList<String> positionTilePCG, int lenMaxColumn)
      Method setStringPCG graphically builds the personal goal card on the TUI.
      Parameters:
      positionTilePCG - - the position of the tiles of the personal goal card.
      lenMaxColumn - - the number of columns that make up the personal goal card.

    • getStringPCG

      public static String getStringPCG()
      getStringPCG method returns the string of the personal goal card.
      Returns:
      - the string of the personal goal card.

    • printTitle

      public static void printTitle()
      Method printTitle prints the title of the game.

    • endGameScore

      public static String endGameScore(String namePlayerClient, ArrayList<PlayerView> players)
      Method endGameScore prints the scoreboard with the points of the players at the end of the game. If the player has won it will graphically print WINNER, otherwise it will print LOSER.
      Parameters:
      namePlayerClient - - the username of the player on the client.
      players - - the list of player currently playing the game.
      Returns:
      - the textual graphic and the scoreboard.

    • graphicsToken

      public static String graphicsToken(int numToken, boolean activeEndN)
      graphicsToken method returns the CGC Token graphics string so that the resulting String can be merged with other Strings.
      Parameters:
      numToken - - number of token CGC.
      activeEndN - - put to true if you do not want to merge the lines of the String with those of another string, otherwise false.
      Returns:
      - the token graphic of the CommonGoalCard with the associated score.
